channel.title: How to add an AutoRestarter on Run automaticly?
channel.description:
How to add an AutoRestarter on Run automaticly ? I would like that when I click on "Run", the restarter say: How many minutes you want to restart ? And you say numbers. After, it works.
How do I do this ?
Thanks.

item.title: How to add an AutoRestarter on Run automaticly?
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

But, I need one that work automatitly when I click on “Run.Bat” or “RunServer.Bat” because I want to try to host on iPod Touch but, I don’t know how to open AutoRestarter on it yet so, I need this.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add an AutoRestarter on Run automaticly?

item.title: How to add an AutoRestarter on Run automaticly?
item.dc:creator: @stewie0888 stewie0888
item.description:
@stewie0888 wrote:

Heres a link to a Restarter. It can restart every 10 min, 30 mins, and 1 hour.

http://rapidshare.com/files/258753535/Voule_Auto_Restarter.exe.html

Here’s a picture of the app.

Read full topic
